channel.title: [Delta] RuneEvolution - Trying to bring back the fun in Delta
channel.description:
[b]Before start flaming for me using delta, i like using the source its easy and when you work on it very hard it can be good. Just trying to make the best of it and mabye make a server like 2speced but then better
Packaging of my Delta [img]http://puu.sh/pa39[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/FmROR.png[/img] Combat
- PvP fully complete - PvN fully complete - Near perfect max hit formulas - Perfect accuracy formula - Every weapon special attack - Equipment effects (i.e. barrows) - Equipment requirements - Degradable equipment/weapons - Weapon poisoning
[img]http://i.imgur.com/C2xH2.gif[/img] Ranged
- Bows/Arrows - Throwing weapons (knives, darts) - Crossbows - Can't shoot through walls - Ranged distances
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HhYtx.gif[/img] Magic - Every modern combat spell - Every ancient combat spell - Can't mage through walls - Charge w/ godspells - Teleblock/binding/freezing - Every other spell including: - Alching/Superheat - Enchanting jewelry
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bQQmu.gif[/img] Prayer - All bones bury-able - Bones on altar - Every prayer working properly - Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate
[img]http://i.imgur.com/uzR97.png[/img] Minigames
- Dueling Arena - Castle Wars - Fight Caves - Fight Pits - Barrows - Magic Arena - Pest Control
[img]http://s4.postimage.org/2l7yce3ac/Agility_icon.png[/img] Agility - Fully gnome course - Barbarian course - Wilderness course - Handy shortcuts through the game
[img]http://s4.postimage.org/2l83b04ro/Cooking_icon.png[/img] Cooking - All fished fish can be cooked - Burning system - Potato creating - Cooking gauntlets
[img]http://s4.postimage.org/2l86m2tr8/Firemaking_icon.png[/img] Firemaking - Burn every log - Clipped lighting - Lighting to the west - Becomes ashes
[img]http://s4.postimage.org/2l89x5iqs/Fletching_icon.png[/img] Fletching - Fletch every bow - Fletch every arrow/bolt/dart [No darts yet]
[img]http://s4.postimage.org/2l8lhwy78/Runecrafting_icon.png[/img] Runecrafting - Every rune can be crafted [Missing astrals, no altar for it] - Tiara making - Fully working pouches
[img]http://s4.postimage.org/2l8s42c6c/Smithing_icon.png[/img] Smithing - Smith everything - Smelting - Iron 50% failing change [Stops after 50+ smithing or wearing ring of forging]
[img]http://s4.postimage.org/2l8vf515w/Thieving_icon.png[/img] Thieving - Stalls disappear/respawn - Pickpocket
[img]http://s4.postimage.org/2l8x2odno/Crafting_icon.png[/img] Crafting - Spinning - Clothes - Gems - Rings/Amulets/Necklace
[img]http://s4.postimage.org/2l93otrms/Fishing_icon.png[/img] Fishing - Fishing guild - Right emotes - Use the right bait - Spots randomly moving - Random event River Troll
[img]http://s4.postimage.org/2l95cd44k/Herblore_icon.png[/img] Herblore
- Creating potions - Correct Supplies, spices and ingredients - Every potion - Mixing - Emptying
[img]http://s4.postimage.org/2l9byii3o/Mining_icon.png[/img] Mining - Mining guild - Randomly gems - Mine everything - Rocks disappear/respawn - Prospecting ores - Random event Rock Golem
[img]http://s4.postimage.org/2l9f9l738/Woodcutting_icon.png[/img] Woodcutting - Cut every tree - Stumps - Bird nest's - Random event Spirit Tree
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20071125155039/runescape/images/c/cb/Miscellaneous_key.png[/img] Miscellaneous
- Pickables - Fillables - Partyroom [Not fully like dancing knights]
[/b]

item.title: [Delta] RuneEvolution - Trying to bring back the fun in Delta
item.dc:creator: @lover854 lover854
item.description:
@lover854 wrote:

[quote=“demps2k9, post:14, topic:439384”]I think you all should stop flaming/trolling this thread. It’s a well known fact Delta is better than PI.

I can think of many reasons as proof. The only downside t Delta is that everything is loaded through the process, and it also has a few combat kinks.

Good look Lover854. I Support.[/quote]

Mine server is just loading some stuff i cant figure out how to load diffrent like showin interfaces in wilderness etc

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] RuneEvolution - Trying to bring back the fun in Delta
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

I think you all should stop flaming/trolling this thread. It’s a well known fact Delta is better than PI.

I can think of many reasons as proof. The only downside t Delta is that everything is loaded through the process, and it also has a few combat kinks.

Good look Lover854. I Support.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] RuneEvolution - Trying to bring back the fun in Delta
item.dc:creator: @lover854 lover854
item.description:
@lover854 wrote:

[b]Before start flaming for me using delta, i like using the source its easy and when you work on it very hard it can be good.
Just trying to make the best of it and mabye make a server like 2speced but then better

Packaging of my Delta

Combat

  • PvP fully complete
  • PvN fully complete
  • Near perfect max hit formulas
  • Perfect accuracy formula
  • Every weapon special attack
  • Equipment effects (i.e. barrows)
  • Equipment requirements
  • Degradable equipment/weapons
  • Weapon poisoning

Ranged

  • Bows/Arrows
  • Throwing weapons (knives, darts)
  • Crossbows
  • Can’t shoot through walls
  • Ranged distances

Magic

  • Every modern combat spell
  • Every ancient combat spell
  • Can’t mage through walls
  • Charge w/ godspells
  • Teleblock/binding/freezing
  • Every other spell including:
    - Alching/Superheat
    - Enchanting jewelry

Prayer

  • All bones bury-able
  • Bones on altar
  • Every prayer working properly
  • Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate

Minigames

  • Dueling Arena
  • Castle Wars
  • Fight Caves
  • Fight Pits
  • Barrows
  • Magic Arena
  • Pest Control

Agility

  • Fully gnome course
  • Barbarian course
  • Wilderness course
  • Handy shortcuts through the game

Cooking

  • All fished fish can be cooked
  • Burning system
  • Potato creating
  • Cooking gauntlets

Firemaking

  • Burn every log
  • Clipped lighting
  • Lighting to the west
  • Becomes ashes

Fletching

  • Fletch every bow
  • Fletch every arrow/bolt/dart [No darts yet]

Runecrafting

  • Every rune can be crafted [Missing astrals, no altar for it]
  • Tiara making
  • Fully working pouches

Smithing

  • Smith everything
  • Smelting
  • Iron 50% failing change [Stops after 50+ smithing or wearing ring of forging]

Thieving

  • Stalls disappear/respawn
  • Pickpocket

Crafting

  • Spinning
  • Clothes
  • Gems
  • Rings/Amulets/Necklace

Fishing

  • Fishing guild
  • Right emotes
  • Use the right bait
  • Spots randomly moving
  • Random event River Troll

Herblore

  • Creating potions
  • Correct Supplies, spices and ingredients
  • Every potion
  • Mixing
  • Emptying

Mining

  • Mining guild
  • Randomly gems
  • Mine everything
  • Rocks disappear/respawn
  • Prospecting ores
  • Random event Rock Golem

Woodcutting

  • Cut every tree
  • Stumps
  • Bird nest’s
  • Random event Spirit Tree

Miscellaneous

  • Pickables
  • Fillables
  • Partyroom [Not fully like dancing knights]

[/b]

Read full topic
